data.title: Hugh Grant pats wife Anna Eberstein's bum on rare date night
data.meta_description: Hugh Grant and his new wife Anna Eberstein hit the town in Mayfair and took a loving stroll home
data.text:
Hugh Grant and his wife Anna Eberstein enjoyed a rare date night together as they visited Loulou's in Mayfair on Thursday night.

The Love Actually star, 58, showed packed on the PDA with gorgeous Anna, as he gently patted her bottom as they made their way home after their night out.

Swedish Anna put on a leggy display as she wore a black chequered mini dress and matching black and white wedges showing off her model figure.

The couple have been together for seven years and married last May in a small ceremony in Chelsea.

Anna is a 40-year-old television producer and fashion retail director from Sweden. It is not known how they first found love but they have been going strong since they met in 2012.

They share three children together, along with two from Hugh's previous relationship with Tinglan Hong.

Hugh Grant was reluctant to marry after his split in 2000 from Elizabeth Hurley, who he still remains close friends with.

He told People Magazine back in 2015: "I'm not really a believer in marriage. I've seen very few good examples, maybe five, in my life, but I think otherwise it's a recipe for mutual misery."

However, Anna seems to have changed his mind.
